PAD_KarlachAfterEnraged.synopsis: After Karlach's enrage she will feel a lot more relieved.
PAD_KarlachAfterEnraged.how_to_trigger: Have Karlach in your party.Open ReConselect S_Player_Karlachstatusapply ORI_KARLACH_ENRAGE 1

AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage.synopsis: After fighting with the paladins, avatar Karlach will get a small dialog in which she will go into a rage.
AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage.how_to_trigger: Defeat the paladins with Karlach participating in the fight as avatar and finishing it with her near the tollhouse or inside or use the origins debug book (Karlach -> Paladins of Tyr -> Test enrage).

PAD_KarlachEnraged.synopsis: Karlach is enraged and starts screaming and breaking items inside the tollhouse in act 1.
PAD_KarlachEnraged.how_to_trigger: Have Karlach in your party.Open ReConselect S_Player_Karlachstatusapply ORI_KARLACH_ENRAGE -1

AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage.synopsis: After becoming enraged for killing the paladins at the toll house, Avatar Karlach will think about what just happened to her.
AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage.how_to_trigger: 1. Start as avatar Karlach.2. In act1, goto 111; 38; 561 and kill the paladins.3. Wait till the status ends, dialog will start.

PAD_KarlachAfterEnraged_0.speaker: Karlach
PAD_KarlachAfterEnraged_0.context: NodeContext: Relieved and self-satisfied, a little tired after raging out

AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_7.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_7.text: I'm gonna destroy this place. Rip it apart, board by board.
AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_7.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach talking to herself silently, this is internal dialogue (no finger-to-temple)

AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_2.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_2.text: Easy, girl. There's no point now - you already killed them all.

AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_6.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_6.text: But wouldn't it do to send a message? Wouldn't it be oh-so-fucking fantastic to leave nothing behind at all?!
AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_6.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach talking to herself silently, this is internal dialogue (no finger-to-temple)

AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_1.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_1.text: I hope you're watching, Zariel. I hope you see how free I am. And I hope you know I'm never, EVER, EVER GOING BACK!
AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: FIRES BURNING AT MAXInternalNodeContext: Karlach talking to herself silently, this is internal dialogue (no finger-to-temple)

AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_5.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_5.text: I'm hot. Really hot. Is this safe?

AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_8.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_8.text: Probably not. Nothing's safe - never will be. But I can feel the fire in every vein, and I'm not gonna let it go to waste.
AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_8.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach talking to herself silently, this is internal dialogue (no finger-to-temple)

AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_9.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachBeforeEnrage_9.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach talking to herself silently, this is internal dialogue (no finger-to-temple)

PAD_KarlachEnraged_3.speaker: Karlach
PAD_KarlachEnraged_3.text: JUST TRY IT, ZARIEL! COME ON!

AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_1.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_1.text: Next best thing to getting laid.

AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_2.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_2.text: Kind of. All right, not close... but still. Pretty good.
AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_2.context: NodeContext: Alt node for line saying it's been so long since she's been intimiate she can hardly remember what it's like.

AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_5.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_5.text: Been so long I can hardly remember.
AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_5.context: InternalNodeContext: Internal dialogue, no speech or mindmeld-hands intended

AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_8.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_8.text: I'm hot. Very hot. Too hot.

AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_7.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_7.text: Deep breaths. I'll be all right. I'll be all right.
AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_7.context: InternalNodeContext: Internal dialogue, no speech or mindmeld-hands intended

AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_3.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_3.text: Maybe I went a little too far...

AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_0.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_0.text: Ah, fuck that. Fire's really going for broke, though.

AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_9.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_9.text: Bloody engine isn't cooling down, is it. Guess it wasn't made to work outside Avernus. Hope it holds together long enough to find an infernal mechanic.

AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_4.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage_4.text: And a stiff drink, while I'm at it.
